cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiyou

sentence.kanji: 太陽が雲に隠れた。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ga kumo ni kakureta
sentence.english: The sun hid behind the clouds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakureru

sentence.kanji: 太陽が雲に隠れた。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ga kumo ni kakureta
sentence.english: The sun hid behind the clouds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zuibun

sentence.kanji: 随分早く終わったね。
sentence.romaji: zuibun hayaku owata ne
sentence.english: You finished really early, didn't you?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoubousho

sentence.kanji: この町には消防署が1つしかありません。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ni ha shoubousho ga hitotsu shika arimasen
sentence.english: There's only one fire station in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ana

sentence.kanji: 靴下に穴が開いている。
sentence.romaji: kutsushita ni ana ga aite iru
sentence.english: There are holes in my socks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yozora

sentence.kanji: ふたりで夜空を見上げたの。
sentence.romaji: futari de yozora wo miageta no
sentence.english: The two of us looked up at the night sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aki

sentence.kanji: 部屋の空きはありますか。
sentence.romaji: heya no aki ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Are there any vacant rooms?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amefuri

sentence.kanji: 雨降りで月が見えなかったね。
sentence.romaji: amefuri de tsuki ga mienakata ne
sentence.english: We couldn't see the moon because of the rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akichi

sentence.kanji: 空き地で工事が始まった。
sentence.romaji: akichi de kouji ga hajimata
sentence.english: Construction started in the vacant lot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikou

sentence.kanji: 夕方以降にお電話を下さい。
sentence.romaji: yuugata ikou ni o denwa wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please call me in the evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusaiteki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は国際的に有名な歌手です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kokusaiteki ni yuumei na kashu desu
sentence.english: She is an internationally famous singer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusaika

sentence.kanji: この大学も国際化してきたな。
sentence.romaji: kono daigaku mo kokusaika shite kita na
sentence.english: This university has internationalized.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousai

sentence.kanji: 彼はモデルと交際していたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha moderu to kousai shite ita n da
sentence.english: He was going out with a model.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sai

sentence.kanji: この際はっきり言っておきます。
sentence.romaji: kono sai hakiri ite okimasu
sentence.english: It's a good opportunity to speak frankly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuusou

sentence.kanji: 彼は空想にふけっているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kuusou ni fukete iru no
sentence.english: He's indulging himself in daydreams.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshou

sentence.kanji: 私があなたの安全を保障します。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga anata no anzen wo hoshou shimasu
sentence.english: I guarantee your safety.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukameru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は異文化に対する理解を深めたね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ibunka ni taisuru rikai wo fukameta ne
sentence.english: She deepend her understanding of different cultures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuuibukai

sentence.kanji: 彼は注意深い人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chuuibukai hito desu
sentence.english: He's a cautious person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女はお年寄りのために席を空けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha otoshiyori no tame ni seki wo aketa n da
sentence.english: She gave up her seat to the elderly person.

cards.english: adjoin, be next door to each other
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tonariau

sentence.kanji: この町は山と海が隣り合っています。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ha yama to umi ga tonariate imasu
sentence.english: This town lies between the sea and the mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukamaru

sentence.kanji: 二人の愛はますます深まっているね。
sentence.romaji: futari no ai ha masumasu fukamateiru ne
sentence.english: Their love has become deeper and deeper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's totsuzen

sentence.kanji: 彼は突然走り出したのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totsuzen hashiridashita no yo
sentence.english: He suddenly began to run.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuku

sentence.kanji: 彼はビリヤードの球を上手に突くね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha biriya-do no tama wo jouzu ni tsuku ne
sentence.english: He shoots pool very well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuitotsu

sentence.kanji: バスが乗用車に追突したよ。
sentence.romaji: basu ga jouyousha ni tsuitotsu shita yo
sentence.english: The bus bumped the passenger car from behind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's guntai

sentence.kanji: 彼は軍隊に入ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha guntai ni haita yo
sentence.english: He entered the military.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuiraku

sentence.kanji: 飛行機の墜落事故があったんだ。
sentence.romaji: hikouki no tsuiraku jiko ga ata n da
sentence.english: There was an airplane crash.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiki

sentence.kanji: あの国は強力な兵器を持っている。
sentence.romaji: ano kuni ha kyouryoku na heiki wo mote iru
sentence.english: That country has strong weapons.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heitai

sentence.kanji: 兵隊が銃をかまえていたよ。
sentence.romaji: heitai ga juu wo kamaete ita yo
sentence.english: The soldier was holding the gun at the ready.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heishi

sentence.kanji: その爆撃で兵士が3人負傷しました。
sentence.romaji: sono bakugeki de heishi ga sannin fushou shimashita
sentence.english: Three soldiers were injured in the bombing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boushi

sentence.kanji: 警察は犯罪の防止に努めています。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ha hanzai no boushi ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: The police are making efforts to prevent crime.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bouka

sentence.kanji: 学校で防火訓練がありました。
sentence.romaji: gakou de boukakunren ga arimashita
sentence.english: There was a fire drill at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sunahama

sentence.kanji: 朝早く砂浜を散歩しました。
sentence.romaji: asa hayaku sunahama wo sanpo shimashita
sentence.english: I strolled on the beach early in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hama

sentence.kanji: 今晩、浜で花火大会がありますよ。
sentence.romaji: konban hama de hanabi taikai ga arimasu yo
sentence.english: There's going to be a fireworks show at the beach tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukomu

sentence.kanji: ポケットに財布を突っ込んじゃった。
sentence.romaji: poketo ni saifu wo tsukon jata
sentence.english: I thrust my wallet into my pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikaeru

sentence.kanji: 最近甘いものを控えています。
sentence.romaji: saikin amai mono wo hikaete imasu
sentence.english: I'm refraining from eating sweets these days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikaeshitsu

sentence.kanji: ここはお客様用の控え室です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha okyakusama you no hikaeshitsu desu 。
sentence.english: This is a waiting room for guests.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karapo

sentence.kanji: 僕の財布は空っぽだよ。
sentence.romaji: boku no saifu ha karapo da yo
sentence.english: My purse is empty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusegu

sentence.kanji: 怪我を防ぐためによくストレッチをしてください。
sentence.romaji: kega wo fusegu tame ni yoku sutorechi wo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please stretch well to prevent injuries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakusu

sentence.kanji: 僕に隠していることは無いですか。
sentence.romaji: boku ni kakushite iru koto ha nai desu ka
sentence.english: You aren't hiding anything from me, are you?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hamabe

sentence.kanji: 浜辺できれいな貝がらを拾いました。
sentence.romaji: hamabe de kirei na kaigara wo hiroimashita
sentence.english: I picked up a beautiful shell on the beach.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oka

sentence.kanji: 丘の上にホテルが建ちましたね。
sentence.romaji: oka no ue ni hoteru ga tachimashita ne
sentence.english: A hotel was built on top of the hill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoubou

sentence.kanji: 消防士は勇敢でなければならない。
sentence.romaji: shouboushi ha yuukan de nakere ba naranai
sentence.english: Fire fighters must be brave.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouji

sentence.kanji: 猫が障子を破った。
sentence.romaji: neko ga shouji wo yabuta
sentence.english: The cat tore the paper sliding door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuukutsu

sentence.kanji: この服は窮屈になったな。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku ha kyuukutsu ni nata na
sentence.english: These clothes have become tight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kara

sentence.kanji: この瓶はもう空ね。
sentence.romaji: kono bin ha mou kara ne
sentence.english: This bottle is already empty.

cards.english: in the air, in the sky
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuuchuu

sentence.kanji: 蝶々が空中を舞っています。
sentence.romaji: chouchou ga kuuchuu wo mate imasu
sentence.english: The butterflies are flying in the air.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ushiro

sentence.kanji: 後ろを向いて。
sentence.romaji: ushiro wo muite
sentence.english: Turn around.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gogo

sentence.kanji: 明日の午後、お客様が来る。
sentence.romaji: asu no gogo okyakusama ga kuru
sentence.english: A guest is coming to visit tomorrow afternoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's owari

sentence.kanji: 夏休みももう終わりだ。
sentence.romaji: natsuyasumi mo mou owari da
sentence.english: Summer vacation's already over.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ato

sentence.kanji: 仕事の後、映画を見た。
sentence.romaji: shigoto no ato eiga wo mita
sentence.english: I saw a movie after work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sen

sentence.kanji: 赤い線を2本引いて下さい。
sentence.romaji: akai sen wo ni hon hiite kudasai
sentence.english: Please draw two red lines.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's owaru

sentence.kanji: 会議は4時に終わります。
sentence.romaji: kaigi ha yoji ni owarimasu
sentence.english: The conference ends at four o'clock.
